admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific
trustfund:
TF021931-OTF - PHILIPPINES ODS PHASE OUT
            INV. PROJ.

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Second Montreal
            Protocol Ozone Depleting Substances Phase Out Project is to
            support the Government's program to phase out Ozone
            Depleting Substances (ODS) by: 1) establishing an efficient
            mechanism for executing ODS phaseout projects through local
            institutions; and 2) implementing an initial group of cost
            effective priority subprojects.  The project includes an
            investment component and a technical assistance (TA)
            component.  The TA component includes: a) an institutional
            strengthening project to strengthen the capability of the
            Department of Environment and Natural Resources (DENR) to
            implement the country ODS phase out program; and b)
            technical assistance to the financial agent, the Land Bank
            of the Philippines, to strengthen its capability to appraise
            and supervise ODS investment projects.  The investment
            component will support sixteen subprojects in: a) ODS
            refrigerant recycling; and b) conversion to non-ODS
            technology in solvents, refrigeration, foam blowing and
            tobacco puffing.
